I believe this is a bug of warp transducer with DataParallel, and not problem of espnet. You should report it as a warp transducer issue with minimum reproducing code, could you? In general we can't always reproduce such errors in multi threading because the threads run in parallel and the timing of accessing depends on the environment. This is the reason sometimes happens and sometimes doesn't happens. It's hard to investigate the condition. DistributedDataParallel may solve this problem as a workaround, but espnet1 doesn't support it.
